title: 03 attractive 30 perch Land blocks -University of Peradeniya to Galaha Road

Total: 90 Perches Perfect Atmosphere, Road Access, Water, And Electricity Available To Site. Ideal For A Holiday Home, Cultivation. Clear Title And For Immediate Sale.
